scripts.build:workspace: dotenvx run -- env HUGO_MODULE_WORKSPACE=go.main.work HUGO_ENVIRONMENT=prod $(hvm status --printExecPathCached) --gc --minify --environment=production
scripts.build:workspace:devel: dotenvx run -- env HUGO_MODULE_WORKSPACE=go.devel.work HUGO_ENVIRONMENT=prod $(hvm status --printExecPathCached) --gc --minify --environment=production
scripts.build:workspace:stage: dotenvx run -- env HUGO_MODULE_WORKSPACE=go.stage.work HUGO_ENVIRONMENT=prod $(hvm status --printExecPathCached) --gc --minify --environment=production
scripts.devel: dotenvx run -- env HUGO_ENVIRONMENT=devel $(hvm status --printExecPathCached) server --port=1613 --disableFastRender
scripts.stage: dotenvx run -- env HUGO_ENVIRONMENT=stage $(hvm status --printExecPathCached) server --port=1614 --disableFastRender
scripts.prod: dotenvx run -- env HUGO_ENVIRONMENT=prod $(hvm status --printExecPathCached) server --port=1615 --disableFastRender
scripts.rebuild:workspace: npm run clean && npm run build:workspace
